text: tatha yadi aap aashchary karate hain, to aashchary karane yogy unaka ye[1] kathan hai ki jab ham mittee ho jaayenge, to kya vaastav mein, ham naee utpatti mein honge? unhonne hee apane paalanahaar ke saath kufr kiya hai tatha unheen ke galon mein toq pade honge aur vahee narak vaale hain, jisamen ve sada rahenge
